N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 58.6 - Requirements for multipurpose passenger vehicles, trucks, and buses with gvwr of more than 10,000 pounds

State Regulations

Each multipurpose passenger vehicle, truck, and bus with a
GVWR of more than 10,000 pounds shall have outside mirrors of unit
magnification, each with not less than 50 square inches of reflective surface, installed with stable supports on both sides of the vehicle. The mirrors shall
be located so as to provide the driver a view to the rear along both sides of
the vehicle and shall be adjustable in both the horizontal and vertical
directions to view the rearward scene. Notes
